name: Major Planet Hyjinks (Demo)
description:
Take control of an alien named Major who's crashed his ship on an unknown planet.
Fight your way through 2 alien environments!
15+ Minutes of gameplay with more to come!
Made for the Beginners Circle Jam 3.

Art by: Holly Thomas (https://planplantsillus.itch.io/)

Music/SFX by: Snil4 (https://soundcloud.com/snil4)
